name: Nova's Storm
description:
Play as Nova, and blast your way through hoards of enemies to get through the level. 

This is a Beta Play-test version 0.01 for you you to enjoy. Feel free to play through this level and destroy the boss. Add any ideas or feedback that would help develop this game into a larger experience. I plan on adding more weapons, characters, levels, and an improved scoring system involving collectibles, keys, skins and more.

Thank you for your support,

Derrick Bruno
